messages: 93f5315ade6080a6f10bee9deee78d0d (01:54): im looking at getting some sort of wire and antenna to improve reception.
93f5315ade6080a6f10bee9deee78d0d (02:07): i want to purchase a wifi pci card off newegg.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (02:09): why are those your two choices?
93f5315ade6080a6f10bee9deee78d0d (02:09): those are just the 2 choices i came up with
93f5315ade6080a6f10bee9deee78d0d (02:10): i have messed around with linux aswell.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (02:10): i dont know about em but the reviews look good and i don't see why not.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (02:10): you should ensure that it works on linux
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (02:10): which may require the use of ndiswrapper.sf.net
93f5315ade6080a6f10bee9deee78d0d (02:11): someone in here actually recomended the cheaper model.
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (02:11): in which case you get functionality but no features
93f5315ade6080a6f10bee9deee78d0d (02:11): what linux is good to use with a wifi card
3129809b96d40660320123f4af9855cf (02:15): any way to tell if someone has "tapped in" to my wireless network?
93f5315ade6080a6f10bee9deee78d0d (02:15): perhaps check the logs in your router
93f5315ade6080a6f10bee9deee78d0d (02:16): see what websites it has visited.
93f5315ade6080a6f10bee9deee78d0d (02:16): and if there are some websites that you dont know. then, you got someone leeching off you.
3129809b96d40660320123f4af9855cf (02:17): how can I tell if someone is on it say..right now
3129809b96d40660320123f4af9855cf (02:17): it must be a default setting
